original_text: And the remnant were slain with the sword of him that sat upon the horse, which sword proceeded out of his mouth: and all the fowls were filled with their flesh.
korean_text: 그 나머지는 말 탄 자의 입으로부터 나오는 검에 죽으매 모든 새가 그들의 살로 배불리더라

sentences.original_text: And the remnant were slain with the sword
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 남은 자들은 칼로 죽임을 당했는데

sentences.original_text: of him that sat upon the horse
which sword proceeded out of his mouth
sentences.korean_translation: 그 칼은 그의 입에서 나온 것이었으며

sentences.original_text: and all the fowls were filled with their flesh
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모든 새들은 그들의 살로 배불렀다
